article.headline: UC Irvine 85, Cal Poly 75
article.story: SAN LUIS OBISPO, Calif. (AP) -- Ross Schraeder scored 20 points including six 3-pointers to help UC Irvine to an 85-75 victory over Cal Poly in the Big West Conference opener for both teams Tuesday night. Schraeder went 6-for-14 from the floor--6-for-6 from behind the arc--and went 2-for-2 from the free-throw line. Darren Fells had 15 points and Greg Ethington had 14 for UC Irvine (6-2, 1-0). After a first half that featured 20 lead changes and 11 ties, UC Irvine led 42-40 at the break. Whiten hit a 3-pointer to open the second half for Cal Poly and give the Mustangs a 43-42 lead. The Anteaters followed with an 8-0 run to go up 50-43 with 18:18 to play and would never trail again. Phil Johnson led Cal Poly (2-6, 0-1) with 18 points on 7-for-10 shooting. Nick Enzweiler added 15 points and a career-high 11 rebounds for the Mustangs, and Dawin Whiten had 14 points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
